description: Unique identifier for each alert
notes: Primary key from MAPMF database

description: Brief headline describing the incident
notes: May contain journalist names and incident type

description: Date when the incident occurred
notes: Incident date (not publication date)

description: Year extracted from the incident date
Month extracted from the incident date (1-12)
notes: 1=January through 12=December

description: Name of the day when incident occurred
notes: Full day name in English

description: Country where the incident took place
notes: 45 unique countries in dataset

description: First administrative region (usually country name or major region)
notes: Sometimes matches country; sometimes regional designation

description: Second administrative region (state/province/city)
notes: More specific geographic location

description: Main/first type of incident from the classification list
notes: First item from type_of_incident list; useful for primary categorization

description: Number of incident types associated with the alert
notes: Indicates complexity/severity of incident

description: Full list of all incident type classifications
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; includes categories like Physical assault, Legal incident, Harassment, etc.

description: Main/first source of the incident
notes: First item from source_of_incident list

description: Full list of sources/perpetrators of the incident
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; indicates who was responsible

description: Context/setting where the incident occurred
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; describes the environment of the incident

description: Full geographic hierarchy from EU membership status to local region
notes: Hierarchical: EU status | Country | Region | City

description: Primary/first gender of journalist(s) involved
notes: Values: Man, Woman, not applicable, no data collected, Unknown gender, Non-binary

description: Count of male journalists/victims in the incident
notes: Derived from gender list

description: Count of female journalists/victims in the incident
notes: Derived from gender list

description: Count of journalists with other/unknown gender
notes: Excludes Man/Woman/not applicable

description: Full list of genders of all journalists/victims involved
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '

description: Main/first type of victim attacked
notes: First item from who_was_attacked list

description: Full list of victim types
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; e.g., Journalist(s)/media worker(s), Media company or publishing house

description: Number of people/entities attacked
notes: Integer for specific counts; 'general_law' for legislative threats affecting journalists in general

description: Professional role(s) of the journalist(s) involved
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; e.g., Journalist/editor, Photographer/camera operator

description: Employment status of the journalist(s) involved
notes: Multiple values separated by ' | '; e.g., Employed, Freelancer, Unknown employment status

description: Number of subjects (individuals/entities) involved in the incident
notes: Count of items in subjects array

description: Types of journalists extracted from subjects
notes: Filtered to show only journalist kinds from subjects

description: Detailed structured data about each subject involved
notes: JSON array with objects containing: kind, amount, who, gender, employment_status, type

description: Full text description of the incident
notes: Detailed narrative of what happened; may contain links to related alerts

description: Character count of the content field
notes: Useful for filtering by detail level

description: Date when the alert was published on MAPMF
notes: Publication date (may differ from incident date)

description: Latitude coordinate of the incident location
notes: WGS84 decimal degrees

description: Longitude coordinate of the incident location
notes: WGS84 decimal degrees
